titles.title: To designate Union Station in Washington, DC, as the "Harry S. Truman Union Station".
To designate Union Station in Washington, DC, as the "Harry S. Truman Union Station".

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Economic Development, Public Buildings and Emergency Management.

committee.subcommittee: Economic Development, Public Buildings and Emergency Management
committee.name: House Transportation and Infrastructure

term.name: Presidents and presidential powers, Vice Presidents

bill.summary: Designates Union Station, located at 405 [sic] Massachusetts Avenue, NE., Washington, DC, as the "Harry S. Truman Union Station."
